text: Portrait of Greta Moll is a painting by Henri Matisse from 1908. It is part of the National Gallery collection in London. In 2019 it moved to Perth Museum in Scotland. ==External links== * Portrait of Greta Moll at the National Gallery website (includes image). * Portrait of Greta Moll at the Tate Modern website. Category:1908 paintings Category:Paintings by Henri Matisse Category:Collections of the National Gallery, London Category:Portraits of women
title: Portrait of Greta Moll
